A smart power strip that tracks energy usage for each device connected to it, and sends a notification to the user when a device is using more energy than usual, or when it's time to unplug unused devices to save energy.
A power strip with built-in surge protectors and a backup battery that can keep essential devices running during a power outage or surge.
A power strip with a built-in WiFi hotspot that allows users to connect multiple devices to the internet and each other.
A power strip with a built-in display that shows the power usage of each device connected to it, as well as the total power usage of the power strip.
A power strip with a built-in voice assistant that can turn devices on and off, set reminders, and answer questions using voice commands.
